id: Change of use of public house into 6 apartments with amenity space and external alterations including new windows and doors - NON MATERIAL AMENDMENT to 23/04667/FU - Amendments to the approved parking layout to allow ease of access into the developed flats from the parking area. The parking will feature a strip of paving to the head of the bays that will allow for circulation from the vehicles to the building. The electric chargers will be repositioned atop the existing stone wall to the head of the bays to allow for simpler electrical cabling to the chargers and easier access to chargers for users. 6 metres has been retained to the rear of the bays to allow for access in and out when reversing. The scheme is also very simple in terms of alterations. The parking layout has been flipped to mirror the existing parking layout and offer better access.
addr: Former Yeoman Public House Gay Lane Otley LS21 3BB
